response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and excellence. We believe its worth to you surpasses $1,000,000, aligning perfectly with your needs and aspirations.

To make this exceptional offer more attractive, I am extending it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value and reflects our commitment to fostering long-term relationships with our esteemed clientele.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of a seamless transaction process and unparalleled customer service to ensure your satisfaction.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
